passive.name: ROLLING ARMORDILLO
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) ROLLING ARMORDILLO
                                While out of combat gain, 32 () Movement Speed, increased to 37 () during Powerball.Exit combat after not taking damage or using abilities for 5 seconds.

q.name: (Q) POWERBALL
q.description:
(Q) POWERBALL
 12/10/8/6s   65 
                                
                                
                                Enables Rolling Armordillo and accelerates up to +110/120/130/140% bonus Movement Speed over 6 seconds. Colliding with an enemy deals 80 magic damage (80/110/140/170 + 100% ) in an area, knocking back and slowing enemies by 40/50/60/70% for 1 second.Activating cancels Defensive Ball Curl and puts it on cooldown.

w.name: (W) DEFENSIVE BALL CURL
w.description:
(W) DEFENSIVE BALL CURL
 6s   40 
                                
                                
                                Spiked Shell: Attacks deal 15 bonus magic damage (10/12/14/16 + 10% ).Active: Brace for up to 6 seconds, slowing Rammus by 30% while gaining 83 Armor (30 + 55/60/65/70% ) and 27 Magic Resist (10 + 35/40/45/50% ). While curled Spiked Shell deals 50% more damage and also applies to enemies that attack Rammus.Deals 175% damage to monsters.Activating cancels Powerball and puts it on cooldown.

e.name: (E) FRENZYING TAUNT
e.description:
(E) FRENZYING TAUNT
 13.5/13/12.5/12s   50 
                                
                                
                                Taunts an enemy champion or monster for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds and gain 35/45/55/65% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

r.name: (R) SOARING SLAM
r.description:
(R) SOARING SLAM
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Hop into the air and slam down, dealing 75 magic damage (75/150/225 + 50% ) and creating aftershocks for 4 seconds.Aftershocks deal 30 magic damage (30/45/60 + 20% ) every second and slow enemies incrementally by 10/12/14 %, stacking up to 50/60/70%.If used during Powerball, Powerball's effect are applied at the center of the landing zone.Soaring Slam's range increases with Movement Speed. Aftershocks damage structures.

boots_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

example_build_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

runes_detailed.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
